本件保存七年
02-62- 2419
MEMORANDUM
August 4, 2
To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C
From C. C. Chang Original signed by Chief, Second Division J. G. Tseng Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX(99-471)
THB requested procurement of diesel engine, pipes and camshaft assemblies as shown in the attached list. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and ship- ment to Taiwan.
Pertinent Reports of Excess Equipment are also attached herewith.
Encl. Reports List

From C. C. Chang Original signed by Chief, Second Division J. G. Tseng Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX(99-471)

THB requested procurement of diesel engine, pipes and camshaft assemblies as shown in the attached list. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and ship- ment to Taiwan.
